string.name: menu_filter_by_store
string.translation_description: The label for the menu item to filter the displayed items by store.

string.name: my_grocery_title
string.translation_description: Title for the 'My grocery' screen where the user can see the list of items that have been added to their grocery.

string.name: item_list_title
string.translation_description: Title for the item list screen where the user can see a list of items available to add to their grocery.

string.name: item_details_title
string.translation_description: Title for the item details screen where the user can see the details for a specific item.

string.name: add_item
string.translation_description: Button text that prompts user to navigate to the Item List to add items to their empty grocery.

string.name: added_item_to_grocery
string.translation_description: Confirmation text that is shown when a user adds a item to their empty grocery.

string.name: grocery_empty
string.translation_description: Text that is shown on the 'My Grocery' screen when no items have been added to the user's grocery

string.name: gallery_title
string.translation_description: Title for the item gallery screen
